xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #medsavant on 03 July 2013
xwikidoc.content: <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 08:19 <sdumitriu> has joined #medsavant 11:46 <sdumitriu1> has joined #medsavant 12:36 <sdumitriu1> has joined #medsavant 13:12 <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 13:12 <bvancea> hey sdumitriu 13:13 <sdumitriu1> Hey bvancea 13:13 <bvancea> sorry for checking in so late, the last 24 hours have been pretty rough for me 13:14 <bvancea> but I've finally managed to get my diploma paper printed :D 13:15 <sdumitriu1> Congrats, you're a BSc 13:15 <bvancea> hehe 13:15 <bvancea> well, I still have my exam 13:15 <bvancea> monday I think 13:17 <sdumitriu1> Oh, I see 13:17 <sdumitriu1> I thought you got the diploma 13:18 <bvancea> nah 13:18 <bvancea> one of the advisors sent some feedback last night 13:18 <sdumitriu1> Was wondering how could that happen... 13:18 <bvancea> and asked if I have enough time to add an additional test 13:18 <bvancea> and I was like, "I think so" 13:19 <bvancea> sadly, it didn't go as planned and I've spent a good part of last night working on it 13:19 <bvancea> since tomorrow is the due date for the handing in of the printed diploma papers 13:19 <bvancea> and you need to print with one day in advance because of the cover 13:20 <bvancea> it was pretty hard to find a place where they'd print the cover in the same day 13:21 <bvancea> since I didn't want to leave it for tomorrow 13:22 <bvancea> anyway, its printed, its perfect, gonna hand it in tomorrow morning and then stop thinking about it until the exam 13:23 <sdumitriu1> Do you have your presentation ready? 13:23 <bvancea> I have the presentation I've used for the local conference 13:23 <bvancea> I did some modifications to it 13:23 <bvancea> to fit in the timespan allocated 13:24 <bvancea> and I'll have a practice presentation session with the reasearch group + advisors 13:24 <bvancea> friday 13:24 <bvancea> so I'll just do my think friday and then include what feedback they have for the actual presentation 13:25 <bvancea> do my thing* 13:26 <bvancea> anyway, back to more pressing issues 13:27 <bvancea> for the remainder of today I'll keep working on the translator 13:27 <sdumitriu1> Progressing? 13:27 <bvancea> not as much as I wanted to 13:28 <bvancea> with all the distractions 13:28 <bvancea> I'll close to finishing something simple 13:28 <bvancea> I'm* 13:28 <bvancea> for the basic select querries 13:29 <bvancea> I was sort of worried not to "copy" the grammar from the xwiki example 13:29 <bvancea> until I found the BNF for JPQL in the java ee documentation 13:30 <bvancea> and it's pretty much the same 13:30 <bvancea> :D 13:37 <bvancea> btw, do you know if Marc had a chance to create the list of entities for MedSavant? 14:06 <sdumitriu1> Asked him 14:06 <sdumitriu1> Waiting for a reply 14:06 <sdumitriu1> It would probably be easier to go to him 14:08 <sdumitriu1> He didn't 14:15 <bvancea> oh 14:15 <bvancea> well, I've made that list 14:15 <bvancea> revised it earlier this week 14:16 <bvancea> maybe he'll get the opportunity to review it 16:46 <sdumitriu1> has joined #medsavant
